name: Capture The Flag (itch) (Solo Design Interactive Studio)
name_original: Capture The Flag (itch) (Solo Design Interactive Studio)
description:
This game was made by one person in 2 days for the Woowie Game Jam 3.0.

- Move with the arrows

Capture the flag is a simple rushing game : You have to take all the bombs of the level in order to spawn the flag, then try to take it before the timeout, watchout because if you take too long the maze go dark and your not be able to see you way.

Simplicity is the key, this game with hand-painted graphics is not that simple.
